snippet: The company, in a wage dispute with workers, said employees had deliberately stopped the production line and threatened supervisors, affecting output for 25 days.
abstract: Indian unit of Toyota shuts down its two factories near Bangalore in response to labor dispute over wages; company says employees deliberately stopped the production line and threatened supervisors, affecting output for 25 days.
lead_paragraph: The company, in a wage dispute with workers, said employees had deliberately stopped the production line and threatened supervisors, affecting output for 25 days.

headline.main: Toyota Unit Shuts 2 Factories in India
headline.print_headline: Toyota Unit in India Shuts Factories in a Labor Dispute
